column5: This is one of the best resource sites to locate info for fishing destinations in Ontario. Over 800 lakes listed by Outfitter, lake depth charts, locations of Outfitters on each lake ,search by location etc. Enjoy the read.http://www.lineonfishing.com/

You are correct, lineonfishing.com is a terrific site. It's operated by adempsy who is a regular contributor on Walleye Central and freely provides a wealth of knowledge and information. I always appreciate his lists of outfitters that match whatever criteria is being asked for. These are always a great starting point for an hour or two of clicking through the internet and daydreaming about my next trip north.
Adam's site is fantastic, I use it all the time! Been pushing him to create a data base like that for the whole country but he's resisting.

Thanks! I am glad you find the site of some use . It currently only contains a directory of those outfitters that offer fly-in outpost camps. Some operate lodges too of course, but there are many lodges not listed.It's always been my intention to add all fly-in and boat-to lodges, but I just haven't got there yet. Not to mention all the outposts outside of Ontario - maybe some day =).
